    • 方法详细资料

      • onPullEvent

        public final void onPullEvent(PullToRefreshBase<V> refreshView,
               PullToRefreshBase.State event,
               PullToRefreshBase.Mode direction)
        从接口复制的说明: PullToRefreshBase.OnPullEventListener
        Called when the internal state has been changed, usually by the user pulling.
        指定者:
        onPullEvent 在接口中 PullToRefreshBase.OnPullEventListener<V extends android.view.View>
        参数:
        refreshView - - View which has had it's state change.
        event - - The new state of View.
        direction - - One of PullToRefreshBase.Mode.PULL_FROM_START or PullToRefreshBase.Mode.PULL_FROM_END depending on which direction the user is pulling. Only useful when state is PullToRefreshBase.State.PULL_TO_REFRESH or PullToRefreshBase.State.RELEASE_TO_REFRESH.

      • addSoundEvent

        public void addSoundEvent(PullToRefreshBase.State event,
                 int resId)
        Set the Sounds to be played when a Pull Event happens. You specify which sound plays for which events by calling this method multiple times for each event.

        If you've already set a sound for a certain event, and add another sound for that event, only the new sound will be played.

        参数:
        event - - The event for which the sound will be played.
        resId - - Resource Id of the sound file to be played (e.g. R.raw.pull_sound)

      • clearSounds

        public void clearSounds()
        Clears all of the previously set sounds and events.

      • getCurrentMediaPlayer

        public android.media.MediaPlayer getCurrentMediaPlayer()
        Gets the current (or last) MediaPlayer instance.
